name: Ghostly Shooting
description:
Ghostly Shooting

A game by Wojciech Kowalczyk 

The following is a submission for Hallowen Jam 2021
Theme: "Ghosts doing normal people things"
https://itch.io/jam/halloween-jam-2021

Jump into the action in a light-hearted shooter platformer, where you play as a ghost who's trying to wipe out all that's left of humanity. Enjoy!

Controls:
WSAD to move
Space to jump, LMB to shoot
M to toggle audio

Assets used:

Sprites:
Work by Lillepeo Ilia Vladimirovich
https://www.fanatical.com/en/bundle/game-graphics-designer-bundle

Music: 
Epic Action by GAmeXovy
Action Epic by 83Crutch
